title: 나의 경험 이야기
description: 다양한 경험에 대한 글을 읽고 이해합니다.

passage.text:
My name is John. I am 28 years old and I love traveling.

I have visited 15 countries so far. I have been to Europe, Asia, and North America. My favorite country has been Japan. I have tried many delicious foods there, and I have met wonderful people.

I have also learned three languages: Spanish, French, and a little bit of Japanese. Learning languages has helped me make friends all over the world.

Last year, I started a travel blog. I have written 50 articles about my trips. Many people have read my blog and some have even traveled to the places I recommended!

Traveling has changed my life. It has made me more open-minded and confident. I have learned so much about different cultures. My dream is to visit every continent!
